original: HJORTH, Arnold Bernhard, Direktör, Djursholm, f Enkpg 1/7 94 av dir B A H o Emma Schill, gm Laila Granberg. Eft avsl skol- o verkstadsstud i Sverige, språk- o hldsstud i Tyskl o Frankr. Dir.ass AB B A Hjorth & Co 14—18, dir där o AB Primus o AB Enkpgs Verkst 18—37, vkst dir dsa bol sed. 37, styr.led där. Stdsflm. Flm Sthlms hdlskamm sed. 34, styr.led Sv Frn f Industr rättsskydd, Sv Järn- o Metallmanuf.frn, Sv Annonsörs frn; Sv Verkstadsfrn :s befullm ombud i Sv Arbetsgivarefrn, Sv Ind.frb :s repres i Sv-Ungerska hdlskamm. Resor: Tyskl, Frankr 12—14, Engl 25 m fi, Mellan-eur, Balk, östeur 26—27, Ital, Span, Span Marocko Alg, Tunis, Trip, Egypt, Britt Ind, Burma, Malacka 26. RVO, TunNI, FinlVRO; div Skytte- o idr.m; KSSS, KMK, KSAK, Sthlm Amatörfrn, Sthlm Yachtklb, Isjaktklb, Sthlm Köpm.klbs nmd, Rotary, Travellers Club mfl. Hobbies: Segling, fisk, isjaktseg-ling.
translated: HJORTH, Arnold Bernhard, Director, Djursholm, b. Enköping 1/7 94, son of director B A H and Emma Schill, m. Laila Granberg. After completing school and workshop studies in Sweden, language and cultural studies in Germany and France. Assistant Director of AB B A Hjorth & Co 14-18, director there and AB Primus and AB Enköpings Verkst 18-37, managing director of the same company since 1937, board member there. Member of the Swedish Chamber of Commerce since 1934, board member of the Swedish Association for Industrial Legal Protection, Swedish Iron and Metal Manufacturers Association, Swedish Advertisers Association, and Swedish Engineering Association; authorized representative of the Swedish Employers Association, representative of the Swedish-Hungarian Chamber of Commerce. Travelled to Germany and France 12-14, England and other countries 25, Central Europe, the Balkans, Eastern Europe 26-27, Italy, Spain, Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, Tripoli, Egypt, British India, Burma, and Malacca in 1926. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Knight of the Tunisian National Order, Knight of the Order of the White Star (Finland); various shooting and sports associations; member of the Royal Swedish Yacht Club, Royal Swedish Motorboat Club, Stockholm Amateur Association, Stockholm Yacht Club, Ice Yacht Club, Stockholm Merchants Club committee, Rotary Club, Travellers Club, and others. Hobbies include sailing, fishing, and ice yacht sailing.
